mapper.sql: o.order_id as OrderId, o.shoping_code as shopingCode, i.text1 as itemname, u.username, o.buyer_message as buyerMessage,i.status, o.status, oi.num, oi.price,oi.total_fee as totalFee, o.payment,os.receiver_name as receiverName,os.receiver_mobile as receiverMobile, os.receiver_prvc as receiverPrvc, o.gmt_create as gmtCreate, o.gmt_modified as gmtModified
mapper.select: select count(1) from gs_order o LEFT JOIN gs_order_shopping os ON o.order_id = os.order_id LEFT JOIN gs_order_item oi ON o.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN gs_user u ON o.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN item i ON oi.item_id=i.id
